overview: Set in the rugged landscape of 1790s Britain, Tornado, is a young and determined Japanese woman who finds herself caught in a perilous situation when she and her fatherâ€™s traveling puppet Samurai show crosses paths with a gang of ruthless criminals led by Sugarman and his ambitious son Little Sugar. In an attempt to create a new life for herself, Tornado seizes the opportunity to take matters into her own hands and steal the gold from their most recent heist.
title: Tornado
